item.title: Callout: GUNA: Views and Voices Deadline 25th Feb 2024
item.description:
Navigators Art are inviting submissions from visual artists based in York for our forthcoming exhibition between 10th March and 6th April 2024.

GUNA is a version of the ancient Greek word for ‘woman’ and the show forms part of the city’s International Women’s Week activities.

York Collective Navigators Art & Performance will accept submissions from visual artists based in York for our forthcoming exhibition at the City Screen Picturehouse gallery between 10th March and 6th April 2024.
